overview_of_class: This course examines the theoretical and conceptual underpinnings of international politics, both inside and outside the discipline of International Relations. It is intended to support graduate students who anticipate engaging in research projects that involve international politics. It considers a range of examples of IR research and explores their theoretical foundations and approaches to concepts.
name: International Relations Theory
title: WCAS POLI_SCI 440-0-1 International Relations Theory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
